verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
My lips shall praise Thee
Thus will I bless Thee
I will lift up my hands
Unto Thy name

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Thy loving kindness
Is better than life
Thy loving kindness
Is better than life

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I lift my hands Lord
Unto Thy name
I lift my hands Lord
Unto Thy name

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Rememb'ring Thee Lord
I'm satisfied
Rememb'ring Thee Lord
I'm satisfied

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Safe in Thy Shadow
I will rejoice
Safe in Thy shadow
I will rejoice
